law.catch_line: Office of Material and Procurement Services.
law.text: The Office of Material and Procurement Services within the Office of the Controller shall be responsible for the performance of the cabinet's purchasing functions under KRS Chapters 45 and 45A, except those purchasing functions related to the acquisition of interests in real property, and contractual and construction services which are related to and required in connection with the construction, renovation, and repair of state-owned buildings. The Office of Material and Procurement Services shall be responsible for the control of all state-purchased personal property.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 12, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 3, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 216, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1994; and ch. 508, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 386, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 33, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 23, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 50, effective June 17, 1978.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/94). This section was amended by 1994 Ky. Acts chs. 216 and 508. Where these Acts are not in conflict, they have been codified together. Where a conflict exists, Acts ch. 508, which was last enacted by the General Assembly, prevails under KRS 446.250.
